headline: True Love
dek: Shakespeare thought music was the food of love. We think kisses are.
excerpt: Actual photos! In living color! Incontrovertible evidence that kissing is fun!
content:
Photography by Janice Rubin

Love and kisses—what a boffo combination! Kissing someone you love has got to be the best feeling in the world, and often it’s the only right way to say I love you. Kisses are never flowery or verbose, they’re never studied or stilted. Every kiss that comes from the heart is perfect. A kiss can be plain or fancy, long or short, a whisper or a smack. And not only do they feel good, smell good, taste good, and sound good, they even look good, as these photos by Janice Rubin clearly show.
